directions: Prepare and bake cake according to directions given on cake mix box using a 9 x 13 inch pan.  Cool in pan.
Prepare pudding according to directions.  Pour on top of cooled cake.  Pour cherries on top of pudding.  Serve.  Refrigerate any leftovers.
ingredients: 1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
title: Cherries in the Snow Cake I
